definition: to exchange conventional greetings/to exchange pleasantries

sentences.english: The next morning the cattle dealer came, and the woman had no need to say many words to him.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早晨，牛販子來了，農婦對他沒有過多的寒喧。

sentences.english: Is the passing of time causing you and me to despair or rejoice?
sentences.chinese: 儘管我和他交談過幾次，但都是寒喧而已。

sentences.english: Please, I don't have time to hold hands.
sentences.chinese: 拜託，我可沒有握手寒喧的時間。

sentences.english: She exchanged a few words of greeting with the guests.
After greetings and some chatting, the negotiation begins.
After introductions, he asks the new neighbor what he does for a living.
sentences.chinese: 寒喧之後，他問他的新鄰居是做什麼的。

definition: to exchange conventional greetings/to talk about the weather
words of politeness/politesse/decorous talking/talk with propriety
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
to call out to/to greet/to say hello to/to inform/to take care of/to take care that one does not
